quotes.quote: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
The smartest billionaires I know never finished high school. I got my degree and my doctorate on the street and an advanced degree in jail.
One of the many qualities that separate self-made billionaires from the rest of us is their ability to ask the right questions.
I never wanted to be on any billionaires list. I never define myself by net worth. I always try to define myself by my values.
I find the fact that billionaires are quoted as if the fact that they are billionaires gives them some kind of wisdom is outrageous.
The death of a billionaire is worth more to the media than the lives of a billion poor people.
Billionaires’ working hours are twenty-four seven. They don’t wait till Monday.
Billionaires should never be responsible for solving problems, because they're not the government.
Millionaires don't use astrology...the billionaires do.
The best way to become a billionaire is to help a billion people.
The billionaire who sits on his money and doesn't do anything for the common good - I'm not interested in that person.
I'm not a paranoid deranged millionaire. Goddamit, I'm a billionaire.
It doesn't matter who you vote for. It's still the same billionaires that run the world.
When billionaire car dealers or manufacturers pay for ambassadorships, at least they pay with money earned by selling something of value.
Look at all the billionaires. If I know 15 billionaires, I know 13 unhappy people.
Some billionaires like cars, yachts and private jets. Others like newspapers.
When you look at billionaires, many of them share one characteristic: They were not born billionaires.
Ever wonder why billionaires always need more and more money? It's a power trip.
You can't become a billionaire stepping over children sleeping on the street.
Unless you're one of the five billionaires out there who don't have to worry about anything, every aspect of everything is stressful, no matter what your job is.
Billionaire investors know they're going to be wrong, so they have a plan to protect against wrong.
